title: Pibbs 514 Kwik Dri Dryer Big Sale!
description:
PIBBS 514 KWIK DRI DRYER W / CASTER BASE 13" X 19"

* Top selling dryer with about 1100 watts, an adjustable height stand, flip top visor, timer control, thermostat and control warning light.
* Warnning : Users must use hair net with this product! Hair should be pinned down orrestrained with this dryer due to the upward air flow.
* Dries very fast. Made in Italy.

title: Joico K-Pak Deep-Penetrating Reconstructor (35.2 oz)
description: Joico - K-Pak Deep Penetrating Reconstructor contains the highest amount of Quadramine Complex than any other product in the Joico family. Hair is left shiny, strong and in a healthy, manageable state. K-PAK Reconstructor results in an immediately noticeable difference in strength, texture and appearance.
